author: Dennis Schulz
comment: So, finally found the culprit of that annoying weather popup! Really liked this app! But not this way, dear Dev.  Get rid of that thing and I'll come back! I may would even pay for your app ;)  but not with those kind of adds

author: Chris quevas
comment: Has gotten to be very intrusive. Over the top pop adds that inhibits daily use. From a 5 star app to 0 star Just make add free one we will pay

author: Erin Hardisty
comment: I get the need to make money but you do not do that by thrusting intrusive adverts onto my phones screen while I am using the device.  Time to find an alternative app I'm afraid...

author: Fernando -
comment: I will give you 1 star until you remove the weather pop up that keeps showing up at random. I agree with another review. "This is a useful app, but not important enough to get random ads like this". UNINSTALLED. I understand it costs to make but that way of doing it is just annoying.

author: Astrobama
comment: Really liked the draw on my watch, but has really intrusive ads on your phone which isn't worth it. That is exactly how you get your app uninstalled!

author: Jordan Manouk
comment: Use this app all the time until you a ridiculous amount of pop up ads come on screen front about a week's ago loved this app until the now. Uninstalling do not even bother downloading this is now a spam app

author: Bailey Killian
comment: Please listen to your reviewers and at least at a Pro Version without ads. Seriously, many of us say we'll happily pay for it rather than have the pop up ad.   Maybe another Pro feature could be more customization of the menu colors. It's great that Black & Red has an transparent picture but it would be even better if I could pick the picture.

author: John Blackledge
comment: Now you're pushing pop-up ads over other applications. The ads have no indication that they are linked to your app. In many, many years if using Android, I have never seen such an invasive gimmick. Uninstalled.

author: Derek Gardner
comment: Deleted! Annoying weather & Ad pop up on phone!! The launcher itself is ok but there are better out there & they don't have the pop ups on you phone.

author: Steven CHAN
comment: Great app but I'm going to UNINSTALL because of the ANNOYING ads. I would pay for the app. I don't want a free version that pops up annoying ads.

author: Gene Magnee
comment: Haven't even used my watch since last update, yet this is draining my phone's battery and showing popup ads, including when using Maps while driving! Safety hazard! Uninstalled!

author: Justin Roylance
comment: I love the launcher itself, uninstalled it because of the ads. If you really need the revenue that bad, just charge for the app. I don't tolerate ads.

author: Simon Seath
comment: Just uninstalled because of the ridiculous adverts popping up all the time! Used to love the app.

author: Randy Martin
comment: Wow... Pop up ads when you least expect them... Will find another app and gladly pay for no ads.... Maybe eventually you'll learn to listen to feedback.

author: Brian Huddleston
comment: Used to love this launcher. This pop up advertisement has become extremely annoying. I will be uninstalling.

author: Todd Bergey
comment: The app is ideal but randomly appearing weather pop-up ads that took a while to track down are unreasonable.  Would pay for the app to eliminate but that doesn't seem to be an option.  Uninstalling.

author: Mark Thomson
comment: Now showing full screen pop up adds at random . Has gone from a must have to an avoid . Find something better for yourself

author: Graham Nind
comment: Really annoying weather pop up has totally ruined this app. Sadly I am uninstalling it.

author: justin happel
comment: Advertisements? This is a useful app but it's not important enough to get random advertisements on my phone from this!

author: Leah Domin
comment: I would rather pay than have ads popping up at all hours of the day.

author: mark housholder
comment: Weather pop ups at random for about a week. Uninstalled but it's still stuck on the watch. Do not get this launcher.

author: John Baker
comment: Have been using for ages but now you get spammed with anoying random popups on your phone, over any app or anything you're doing.  This is almost phone hijack advertising. And for this reason i will be uninstalling and no longer be using this once was great app

author: Vassil Dimov
comment: Very annoying ads on phone screen. Is it possible to get an ad-free version of the app?

author: Jan Harley
comment: Seems OK so far but waiting to see what these pop ups people are referring to.  Will delete app if they pop up on my phone

author: Scott Martin
comment: WHY AM I NOW GETTING POP UP ADS??? This never happened until a week ago, it's taken me this long to work out where they are coming from!!! NOT HAPPY, MAY UNINSTALL IF POP UPS DON'T GO!

author: Pete Koutoulas
comment: Somewhat useful but recently started radomly showing popup add on my phone without asking permission. Uninstalled.

author: Sang Han
comment: Daily weather pop up ad over homescreen. Doesn't even tell you it's from Apollo launcher. And no way to disable...

author: Ryan
comment: Same as below, well designed app for watch but despite actually disabling every one of the app's permissions it manages to send a spam message via your browser every...single...day. Watch out for this one, that makes me question the privacy aspect quite honestly...UNINSTALL

author: Jessica K
comment: Uninstalled because of the random weather pop up ads on my phone.

author: Antoine Colquitt
comment: When the heck did this weather pop-up get added, pure trash avoid!

author: Gabriel Florian
comment: Annoying weather pop-up, please stop!!! Please just stop! You will not make money this way! Not a penny!

author: Issac Nielsen
comment: As soon as you start having pop ups like that for ads over everything else... Uninstalled....

author: Rishabh Malhotra
comment: Nice concept but super intrusive ads Won't compromise mobile for just a little more convenience on watch Uninstalling Avoid at all costs

author: Sabih ul islam
comment: Popup ads, and it was hard to figure out that this app was showing those random popups

author: Dario p
comment: Since pop up shop up i hate every second of it. Finally i decide to delete it.

author: Bryan Willis
comment: Adware. Causes rogue pop ups on phone. Shouldn't be allowed in the play store.

author: Ian Barker
comment: Weather popup on phone screen is unacceptable. Very poor design..

author: paul newton
comment: Would get 5* if no annoying pop ups

author: John Thomas
comment: Uninstalled. Constant annoying pop up ads.

author: Michael Riley
comment: Make a pro version to kill the ads
